plentry.pd: To avoid modifying terabytes of data during upgrades, the EDW only upgrades the file format of its data files as new data is loaded. Over multiple upgrades, this can result in a data store with many versions of the files some rare cases, newer versions of the data store provide better performance or other features, and it is advantageous to manually upgrade production tables to the latest version. Consult IgniteTech Support before using this command, because it can be very slow and results in the table being unreadable by older versions of the EDW.
